title: Create streaming app with movies and TV episodes

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store movie information including title, description, thumbnail URL, video URL, duration, genre, and release year
acceptanceCriteria: Movie type is defined with all required fields
CRUD operations are available for movies
Movies can be queried and listed

requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store TV show information including show title, description, thumbnail URL, and seasons
acceptanceCriteria: TV show type is defined with show-level metadata
Shows can contain multiple seasons
CRUD operations are available for TV shows

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for episodes that belong to TV shows, including episode title, description, thumbnail URL, video URL, duration, season number, and episode number
acceptanceCriteria: Episode type links to parent TV show
Episodes are organized by season and episode number
Episodes can be queried by show and season

requirements.text: Implement backend methods to add, update, delete, and retrieve movies
acceptanceCriteria: Movies can be added with all metadata
Movies can be updated
Movies can be deleted
All movies can be listed
Individual movies can be retrieved by ID

requirements.text: Implement backend methods to add, update, delete, and retrieve TV shows and their episodes
acceptanceCriteria: TV shows can be added with metadata
Episodes can be added to shows
Shows and episodes can be updated and deleted
Episodes can be listed by show
Episodes can be filtered by season

requirements.text: Create a frontend home page that displays a grid of all available movies with their thumbnails, titles, and brief metadata
acceptanceCriteria: Movies are displayed in a responsive grid layout
Each movie card shows thumbnail, title, duration, and genre
Cards are clickable to view movie details

requirements.text: Create a frontend page that displays a grid of all TV shows with their thumbnails, titles, and episode counts
acceptanceCriteria: TV shows are displayed in a responsive grid layout
Each show card displays thumbnail, title, and number of episodes
Cards are clickable to view show details and episodes

requirements.text: Create a frontend detail page for movies that displays full information and includes a video player
acceptanceCriteria: Movie detail page shows all metadata
Video player allows playback of the movie
User can navigate back to the movie list

requirements.text: Create a frontend detail page for TV shows that displays show information and lists all episodes organized by season
acceptanceCriteria: Show detail page displays show metadata
Episodes are grouped by season
Each episode shows thumbnail, title, duration, and episode number
Episodes are clickable to play

requirements.text: Create a frontend episode player page with video playback and episode metadata
acceptanceCriteria: Video player allows episode playback
Episode title and description are displayed
User can navigate back to the show detail page
User can navigate to next/previous episode if available

requirements.text: Implement a navigation system with separate sections for Movies and TV Shows
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation bar includes Movies and TV Shows links
Active section is visually indicated
Navigation is accessible from all pages

requirements.text: Design a cohesive streaming platform visual theme with modern, cinematic aesthetics using rich colors, elegant typography, and sophisticated layouts
acceptanceCriteria: Visual theme uses rich, cinematic colors distinct from blue and purple
Typography is elegant and readable
Layouts emphasize visual content and media thumbnails
Design is consistent across all pages

constraints: All backend logic must be implemented in a single Motoko actor
Video URLs must be stored as text references, not actual video file storage
Use React with TypeScript for all frontend components
Apply Tailwind CSS for all styling
nonGoals: Actual video file hosting or storage
Social features like ratings or comments

required: Hero banner image with cinematic streaming theme for homepage (hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png)
Placeholder movie poster for sample content (movie-poster-placeholder.dim_300x450.png)
Placeholder TV show poster for sample content (tv-show-poster-placeholder.dim_300x450.png)
